title: A1466 820-00165-A black screen
message:
Hi.

I have an A1466 820-00165-A that had liquid contact, but has no signs of corrosion.

The lcd blinks (turns black) for a few seconds, and then gets image again. After a while it does the same thing.

Already replaced U7701, and tried with a known good LCD, the the problem persists.

It seams a image problem and not a BL problem, because I notice the same problem with an external monitor simultaneously .

Can you help?

title: A1466 820-00165-A black screen
message:
Tried known good LIO flex/board?
Monitor SMC_LID signal.

title: A1466 820-00165-A black screen
message:
Hi, TKS.
The SMC_LID was OK, but it was the LIO board causing the problem.
TKS!
